me nisa prawahana amathyawaraya mema dumriya sama dinakama dhawanayata yomu karana lesa dumriya baladharinta niyoga kaleya.mandayath dumriya departhamenthuwa me wanawitath thiranaya kara aththe sama sikurada, senasurada irida saha sanduda yana dinayanwala pamanak mema dumriya dhawanaya kirimataya.

bodhiraja mawathe aluth kada kamara dimedi sidu wu akramikatha polisiyen soyayi hemantha randunu rajaya magin pitakotuwa bodhiraja mawathe idikala welendasal padika wedikawen iwath kala welendunta laba nodi wenath pirisakata labadun bawa kiyana siddhiyak sambandhayen kolambaa aparadha kottasaya saha parisara aarakshaka kottasaya pulul parikshanayak aarambha kara athi bawa niyojya polispathi anura senanayaka mahatha pawasayi.

mita amatharawa pol nishpadanaya pahala watima pilibandawa anek karunu soya bala ema karmanthaya muhuna pa sitina anek gatalu wisandima pinisa mulika wada piliwela rasak sakas kirimata rajaya piyawara gena athayi aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.me pilibandawa mulika sakachchawak aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathwina.danata waga kara athi pol idamwalin ihalama paladawak labagatha haki ayurin pohora yedima dirimath kirimata da mehidi thiranaya wiya.

owunge janatha satan walin hamadama owun labana wasi mehema: upadhiyak thibi pamanin ayekuta rassawak kawuran ho diya yuthu yayi janathawa gonata anndawa thibima; kusalathawaya matha nowa upadhiya matha wethana thiranaya wima; wruththiya ihala thanathuru walata ratha wahana parmit wani wishesha waraprasada; aanduwe rassawaka yedena nisa badu gewimen nidahasa; aanduwen gewana indhana ha ratha wahana pawichchiya; eheth thawath mudal upayana katayuthu wala yedennata, pudgalika wyapara karannata da awahirayak nithiyen nomathi wima ‚Ä¶
owun kuda wiye piyage rukawaranaye wasaya kala yuthu athara tharuna wiyedi thama samiyage anasaka yatathe wisiya yuthu wiya.

wasara dahasakata wada parani yunesko loka urumayak lesa nam kota thibena, palamuwana raja raja chola wisin ladikarana lada thanjawur pihiti perawudeyar kowila (brihadishwarar kowila) saha dewana raja raja chola wisin 12 wana siyawasedi idikarana lada kumbakonam walata aasanna darasuram nagaraye pihiti loka urumayak wu ayirawatheshwara kowilada, thanjawur disthrikkaye pradhanathama sancharaka aakarshanaya sahitha sthana lesa salake.

maga patalawa gaththa wun atharaman wuye ada eeye sita nowe. 1969, 1970, 1978, 1983, 1994, 2008 aadi wakawanu thula pudgala waharima, sanwidhana winaya binda damim, piligath nyayika sthawarayanta patahani sthawarawala hindimin katayuthu kirim pakshaye thorathuru sathurata heli kirim, pakshaye daru wagakim pilibanda prasiddhiya laba ganime gijukam aadi hethu matha wiwidha piris pakshayata erehi wemin katayuthu kara atha.
